 (Center 2) Promotion for new prepaid subscribers in March 2014 ( second round) 1. Content: &#12288; Eligibilty Benefits (cannot be reserved) Notes First top up 2nd - 6th top up Periodically promotion Program 1 VND0 starter kit (MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ) - Loaded BEFORE 8th May, 2014 - Bonus 100% of top up value: 50% added to KM2 credit, 50% added to KM3 credit - Loaded BEFORE 8th June, 2014 - Bonus 50% of top up value: 25% added to KM2 credit, 25% added to KM3 credit - First time: VND 30.000/30 days added to KM1 credit (on the following day of activation) - Next 11 times: VND30.000/ 30 days added to DK2 credit, at the promotion evaluation time: Second time: the balance in KM1 credit is Next 10 times: have loaded at least VND10.000 in the previous 30 days. MobiQ subscribers get bonus 60 days of use after activation. Program 2 M0 starter kit (MobiQ ) - Loaded BEFORE being blocked 2 way communication (since activation) - Bonus 100% of top up value: 50% added to KM2 credit, 50% added to KM3 credit - Loaded BEFORE being blocked 1 way communication, before the 90th day (since activation) - Bonus 50% of top up value: 25% added to KM2 credit, 25% added to KM3 credit - First time: VND 30.000/30 days added to KM1 credit (on the following day of activation)) - Next 11 times: VND30.000/ 30 days added to DK2 credit, at the promotion evaluation time: Second time: the balance in KM1 credit is Next 10 times: have loaded at least VND10.000 in the previous 30 days. MobiQ subscribers get bonus 60 days of use after activation.. &#12288; 2. Regulations: Periodically bonus (TK KM) can only be used within 30 days SMS after first addition : "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK KM1. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" SMS for the next 11 additions: "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. T/g su dung toi da: 30 ngay tu dd/mm/yyyy. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" SMS sent 5 days prior to addition to KM ĐK2 credit : "[TB] Quy khach vui long nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang truoc dd/mm/yy hh:mm:ss de duoc huong uu dai dinh ky 30.000d/thang. Chi tiet lien he 9090" If subscriber is under other promotions that add bonus to ĐK2 credit, the balance in TK ĐK2 credit will be reset to to 0 before adding bonus of the new promotion 11 times of bonus added to DK 2 credit cannot be reserved . 3. &#45804;&#50640; &#52572;&#49548; 10.000 &#46041;&#51012; &#52649;&#51204;&#54644;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. MobiQ &#51064;&#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#44060;&#53685;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#49324;&#50857;&#44592;&#44036; 60 &#51068; &#51012; &#52628;&#44032;&#46108;&#45796;. &#12288; 2.&#44508;&#51221;: &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; ( 30&#51068;&#50640;&#47564; &#49324;&#50857;&#54624; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796;. &#52395;&#48264;&#51704;&#50640; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857;: "[TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK KM1. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" &#45796;&#51020; &#48264;&#50640; &#52628;&#44592;&#46112; &#46412; (11&#48264;) &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857;: [TB] MobiFone da cong 30.000d vao TK DK2. T/g su dung toi da: 30 ngay tu dd/mm/yyyy. Nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang de huong uu dai thang tiep theo" &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;2&#50640; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; &#49884;&#51216; 5&#51068;&#51204;&#50640; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; &#45236;&#50857;: [TB] Quy khach vui long nap toi thieu 10.000d/thang truoc dd/mm/yy hh:mm:ss de duoc huong uu dai dinh ky 30.000d/thang. Chi tiet lien he 9090" &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#45716; &#44592;&#53440; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54644;&#49436; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#50640;&#49436; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#44256; &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;&#47484; &#48155;&#44592; &#51204;&#50640; &#44228;&#51221; 2 &#51032; &#45224;&#50500; &#51080;&#45716; &#51092;&#50529;&#51008; &#49325;&#52404;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828;2&#50640; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; 11&#48264;&#51008; &#48372;&#47448;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45796;. 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44592;&#44036;: 2014&#45380; 03&#50900; 20&#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2014&#45380; 03&#50900; 22&#51068; &#44620;&#51648; (&#6040;.&#6023;2) &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6102; &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; (&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6033;&#6075;&#6016;) &#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091; &#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6086;&#6036;&#6076;&#6020; &#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6033;&#6072; 2>6 &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018; &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072;1 &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 0đ (MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ) - &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043; &#6040;&#6075;&#6035; 08/05/2014 -&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; 10 0% &#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;: 50% &#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; KM2 &#6035;&#6071;&#6020; 50% &#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; KM3 - &#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043; &#6040;&#6075;&#6035; 08/06/2014 -&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; 50% &#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6016;&#6070;&#6031;&#6016;&#6084;&#6047;: 25% &#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; Chi tiet lien he 9090" &#6036;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; ĐK2 ,&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; ĐK2 &#6035;&#6073;&#6020; reset &#6040;&#6016;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017; 0 &#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6032;&#6098;&#6040;&#6072;&#6100; ​ 3. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 20/03/2014 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 22/03/2014
